original_text: Kareah's son Johanan and the army officers who were with him heard news about what had happened. They heard about the wicked things that Nethaniah's son Ishmael had done.
korean_text: 가레아의 아들 요하난과 그와 함께 있는 모든 군 지휘관이 느다냐의 아들 이스마엘이 행한 모든 악을 듣고

sentences.original_text: and the army officers who were with him
heard news about what had happened
They heard about the wicked things
that Nethaniah's son Ishmael had done
